content:
Is anyone here connected with this?
https://www.healthdatamanagement.com/news/efforts-to-begin-to-create-a-governance-structure-for-fhir?utm_campaign=ReinventRadiology-Oct%2015%202018&utm_medium=email&utm_source=newsletter

This seems like a rather unfortunate way to describe what might be a useful thing do... but why carequality?
As a side point, is it appropriate/useful to nudge the media organization to remind them that FHIR is a registered trademark and should be marked as such?
Yes I can help with Carequality questions.

Hello Grahame,
Unfortunately, this article was very poorly written and does not portray what Carequality's role will be. This reporter picked up on call for participation issued on October 10. https://carequality.org/fhir-technical-policy-workgroups-forming-now/
Please let me know if I can help further....if I do not know the answer, I know how to get it. ;-)
that call for parrticipation is not long on details
